items.name: PreConfirmID
items.label: كد شناسايي مسئول مستقيم
items.sql:
SELECT USR_REPORTS_TO
FROM users
WHERE USR_UID = "@#RequestID" and USR_STATUS = "ACTIVE"

items.name: Subject_Title
items.label: عنوان موضوع
items.sql:
SELECT Subject_Title
FROM PMT_TB110006
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0098'
 and Subject_Code = "@#Subject_Code"

items.name: ORG_Name
items.label: نام سازمان
items.sql:
SELECT ORG_Name
FROM PMT_TB100009
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and ORG_Code = "@#Org_Code"

items.name: Org_Code_L0
items.label: دامنه سازماني درخواست
items.sql:
SELECT '000' ID, 'واحد اصلي را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT ORG_Master_Code, CONCAT (ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and ORG_L1_Code = 0
 and ORG_L2_Code = 0
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'

items.name: Org_Code_L1
items.sql:
SELECT 0 ID, 'واحد سطح يك را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT ORG_L1_Code, CONCAT (ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and ORG_L1_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L2_Code = 0
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_Master_Code = '@#Org_Code_L0'

items.name: Org_Code_L2
items.sql:
SELECT 0 ID, 'واحد سطح دو را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT ORG_L2_Code, CONCAT (ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and ORG_L1_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L2_Code <> 0
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_Master_Code = '@#Org_Code_L0'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#Org_Code_L1'

items.name: Subject_Code_Main
items.label: موضوع اصلي
items.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, 'موضوع اصلي را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT Subject_Code, CONCAT (Subject_Code," || ",Subject_Title)
FROM PMT_TB110006
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0098'
 and Subject_Category_L1_Code = 0

items.name: Subject_Code_500
items.label: موضوع فرعي
items.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, 'موضوع فرعي را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT Subject_Code, CONCAT (Subject_Code," || ",Subject_Title)
FROM PMT_TB110006
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0098'
 and Subject_Category_L0_Code = 5 
 and Subject_Category_L1_Code <> 0

UNION

SELECT '000-00' ID, 'تغيير موضوع اصلي ...' ID

items.name: Request_Description
items.label: شرح درخواست
items.sql:
SELECT Subject_Temp
FROM PMT_TB120022
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and Subject_Code = '@#Subject_Code'
